name: ∆ntHill
description:
Welcome to Anthill

As the leader of your ant colony, it is up to you to guide your ants through the challenges of the forest and ensure their survival until winter.

To do this, you will need to carefully explore your surroundings, gather resources such as food, water, and materials to build up your anthill.

Remember, the ultimate goal is to collect the highest score possible and ensure the survival of your colony.

So get out there and lead your ants to victory!

Controls

Mouse.

Check the tutorial in the game first! :)

Full-screen mode is highly recommended.

Credits
